profile:
With 10 years of experience in the after-disaster restoration field, the leaders of Construction Sinistre Quebec guarantee an unrivaled turnkey service.

Construction Sinister Quebec is based on the excellence of its customer service, on the integrity of its employees and on the quality of its work. This company offers a complete after disaster service, starting with a 24/7 available emergency intervention that ends with a high-quality reconstruction contract covered by a five-year guarantee.

“Our duty is the restauration of your home “
name: Construction Sinistre Québec 24/7
